snippet: At least two high executives at New York University got big bonuses on leaving, and prominent faculty members have received big housing loans.
abstract: New York University tax returns shows Dr Harold S Koplewicz, an executive at NYU Medical Center, received $1,230,00 payment in 2009-2010 fiscal year, around the time he left to found a competing organization; revelation follows discovery of NYU's sizable parting gift to Jacob J Lew, former university executive and now confirmed to lead Treasury Department.
lead_paragraph: At least two high executives at New York University got big bonuses on leaving, and prominent faculty members have received big housing loans.

headline.seo: N.Y.U. Gives Lavish Parting Gifts to Some Star Officials
headline.main: More Than One N.Y.U. Star Got Lavish Parting Gift
headline.print_headline: More Than One N.Y.U. Star Got Lavish Parting Gift
